name: Disney Magic Castle: My Happy Life
name_original: Disney Magic Castle: My Happy Life
description:
Disney Magic Castle: My Happy Life is a game developed by h.a.n.d.. It was originally released in 2013. Bandai Namco Entertainment published the game.
Disney Magic Castle: My Happy Life is available on Nintendo 3DS.
Adam Evanko, Emiko Yamamoto, Kentaro Hisai and Tsuyoshi Kobayashi produced the game. Kouji Yamamoto and Takahiro Okano directed the game. Keiki Kobayashi scored the game.
